definitions: an entertainer who continuously tosses into the air and catches a number of objects so as to keep at least one in the air while handling the others
shortDefinitions: entertainer who continuously tosses into air and catches number of objects so as to keep at least one in air while handling others

definitions: a person who adroitly balances several activities

examples.text: you will need to be a deft juggler of competing priorities and tight deadlines

shortDefinitions: person who adroitly balances several activities
